structure.unit: COUNTIES, CITIES, AND OTHER LOCAL UNITS
ORGANIZATION AND GOVERNMENT OF CITIES OF THE SECOND CLASS (Superseded)

law.history: Repealed 1982 Ky. Acts ch. 434, sec. 15. -- Amended 1976 (1st Extra. Sess.) Ky. Acts ch. 14, sec. 77. -- Recodified 1942 Ky. Acts ch. 208, sec. 1, effective October 1, 1942, from Ky. Stat. secs. 3049, 3058-1, 3107, 3108, 3109, 3110, 3111, 3112, 3114, 3116.
